changeSet.author: Eray Oral
changeSet.sql: UPDATE SHIPMENT_UNIT SU SET TYPE_ID = (SELECT MAX(SUP.TYPE_ID) FROM SHIPMENT_UNIT_PACKAGE SUP WHERE SUP.SHIPMENT_UNIT_ID = SU.ID)

changeSet.author: kilimci
changeSet.sql: update INCOTERM set active = 1

changeSet.author: kilimci
changeSet.sql: update SHIPMENT set STATUS = 'RESERVED' where STATUS is null

changeSet.author: kilimci
changeSet.sql: update SHIPMENT set STATUS = 'CREATED' where STATUS = 'RESERVED'

changeSet.author: kilimci
changeSet.sql: update TRANSPORT_ORDER set status = 'CREATED' where status = 'RESERVED'

changeSet.author: kilimci
changeSet.sql: delete from document_type

changeSet.author: kilimci
changeSet.sql: update ORDERS set COUNTRY_CODE = 'TR'

changeSet.author: kilimci

changeSet.sql: update order_shipment set insured = 0;

changeSet.author: kilimci
changeSet.sql: update order_shipment_adr set package_type_id = (select id from adr_package_type where code = 'Pallet'), inner_package_type_id= (select id from adr_package_type where code = 'Box')

changeSet.sql: insert into adr_package_type values(seq_adrpackagetype.nextval, 'Can','Can',0,null,current_timestamp,'alper.kilimci');
